title: Kartoffelkäse (Potato Cheese Spread)
directions: Wash the potatoes. (You can remove the skin if you want to, but you don't have to)
Transfer the cooked potatoes into a bowl and mash them with a potato masher. (I like it chunky, but feel free to mash it so long until no pieces are left)
Mix in the sour cream and spices and stir.
Adjust salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: 1 cup vegan sour cream (Follow Your Heart, Joya,...)
